name: KILLERBOT
description:
KILLERBOT is a game about killing robots and shooting crystals that somehow give you ammo.

Initially featuring 3 levels.

The game supports local multiplayer, hit ENTER while playing to start a coop game.

Controls
Player One: WASD + Shift
Player Two: Arrow Keys + Right Control

Currently working on a major update, please be patient!


Cauê: Programming, Audio and Sprites
Vitor: Idea and Project Management
